title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

  • “Scratchwork” can be ignored; the use of a variable other than x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4baaaa@39F9@ is acceptable. Arithmetic errors following a correct solution may be considered “scratchwork.”

  • An alternate solution for (i) is x= log b  10 log b  e −3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4A13@ , where b>0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGIbGaeyOpa4JaaGimaaaa@3BA5@ , b≠1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGIbGaeyiyIKRaaGymaaaa@3C65@ , and the result is evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions.

  • Supporting work in (ii) must include x 2 =sin( π 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F5@ OR x 2 = 2 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D97@ OR x 2 = 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8C@ .

  • Where applicable, answers that have not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions do not earn the point. Rationalizing denominators is not required.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Solution to g(x)=10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EB8@ with supporting work

  • Solution to h(x)= π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FEF@ with supporting work

  • Two components. One of the following:

    • Correct answer in (i) without supporting work

    • Correct answer in (i) with supporting work, but the answer has not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions. No incorrect work.

    • Answer in (i) is reported as x+3=ln 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4183@ . No incorrect work follows.

      AND One of the following:

    • Correct answer in (ii) without supporting work

    • Correct answer in (ii) with supporting work, but the answer has not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions. No incorrect work.

    • Answer in (ii) is reported as x 2 =sin( π 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F5@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Answer in (ii) is reported as x 2 = 2 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D97@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Answer in (ii) is reported as x 2 = 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8C@ . No incorrect work follows.

The student response includes one of these criteria.

  • Solution to g(x)=10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EB8@ with supporting work

  • Solution to h(x)= π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FEF@ with supporting work

  • Two components. One of the following:

    • Correct answer in (i) without supporting work

    • Correct answer in (i) with supporting work, but the answer has not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions. No incorrect work.

    • Answer in (i) is reported as x+3=ln 10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4183@ . No incorrect work follows.

      AND One of the following:

    • Correct answer in (ii) without supporting work

    • Correct answer in (ii) with supporting work, but the answer has not been evaluated according to bullets 2 and 3 in the Directions. No incorrect work.

    • Answer in (ii) is reported as x 2 =sin( π 4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42F5@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Answer in (ii) is reported as x 2 = 2 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D97@ . No incorrect work follows.

    • Answer in (ii) is reported as x 2 = 1 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D8C@ . No incorrect work follows.

The student response includes both of these criteria.

  • Solution to g(x)=10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EB8@ with supporting work

  • Solution to h(x)= π 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FEF@ with supporting work
